title: Drawing, 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouace on gray paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower center: Lugt 457e
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at center right:  rock; and at lower right: Over
Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  Over
description:
Recto:  The Falls are visible in the back center framed by tree-covered hills.

Verso:  Tree tops fill the foreground, ridges rise in the middleground, and high ranges with a central snow-covered peak rise in the background above the clouds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1853.
1853. Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouace on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-262.
